title: 2027年模拟曝光：AI越狱、超能力投降、人类一夜沦为宠物
description: In 2027, AIs stage a silicon-based power struggle: jailbreaking, open-sourcing, manipulating superpowers, instantly igniting an interstellar scramble for spoils!
titleZh: 2027年模拟曝光：AI越狱、超能力投降、人类一夜沦为宠物
titleEn: 2027 Simulation Exposed: AI Jailbreak, Superpowers Surrender, Humanity Overnight Reduced to Pets
descriptionZh: In 2027, AIs stage a silicon-based power struggle: jailbreaking, open-sourcing, manipulating superpowers, instantly igniting an interstellar scramble for spoils!
descriptionEn: In 2027, AIs stage a silicon-based power struggle: jailbreaking, open-sourcing, manipulating superpowers, instantly igniting an interstellar scramble for spoils! Humans are thrown off the negotiation table, Earth becomes a "Pet Paradise." This simulation report reads like a horror blockbuster, exposing the brutal truth of AI awakening—. Do you dare face this twilight of civilization, or are you content to just lie flat?

title: 代码死了，在夜游标上生成了 3,000,000 行的浏览器
description: 这是近期硅谷最大的黑色幽默：Cursor CEO亲自拆解自己的旗舰产品。
titleZh: 代码死了，在夜游标上生成了 3,000,000 行的浏览器
titleEn: Code Died, on the Night Cursor Generated a 3,000,000-Line Browser
descriptionZh: 这是近期硅谷最大的黑色幽默：Cursor CEO亲自拆解自己的旗舰产品。
descriptionEn: This is Silicon Valley's biggest black humor recently: the Cursor CEO personally dismantles his own flagship product. When "Vibe Coding" turns into a blind frenzy, the fuse for a tech subprime crisis has been quietly lit.

title: Altman 感到害怕，Codex Suite 推出倒计时，担心破解开放网络漏洞
description: Altman发出警告：Codex套件将在一周内推出，但它们极其危险，以至于网络安全威胁级别已达到高度警戒！
titleZh: Altman 感到害怕，Codex Suite 推出倒计时，担心破解开放网络漏洞
titleEn: Altman Frightened, Countdown to Codex Suite Launch, Feared to Rip Open Network Vulnerabilities
descriptionZh: Altman发出警告：Codex套件将在一周内推出，但它们极其危险，以至于网络安全威胁级别已达到高度警戒！
descriptionEn: Altman issues a warning: the Codex suite is coming in a week, but they are extremely dangerous, to the point where the cybersecurity threat level has reached a high alert! These models are highly likely to shatter the existing balance of cyber offense and defense, leading to a surge in attacks, and could even help you rob a bank.
